name: 本·贝拉米
introduction: Overview (1)Height	6' 2" (1.88 m)Mini Bio (1)Ben Bellamy was born in London but grew up near San Francisco, CA. After high school in the Bay Area, he lived in Amsterdam for a year before returning to London for university, where he got a BA in English and an MA in Shakespeare. He trained professionally as an actor at Drama Studio London and enjoyed a career in theatre before landing his debut feature film role as Caleb Zechman in 'Prep School', due out in 2013. He now lives in Los Angeles.
